## gf_friends

## Description
Graph of friends in a social network.


## Usage
```r
gf_friends(sc)
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| sc | A Spark connection. |








## Examples
```r


library(sparklyr)
sc <- spark_connect(master = "local")
gf_friends(sc)


```
